Jackett.description:
Jackett works as a proxy server: it translates queries from apps (Sonarr, SickRage, CouchPotato, Mylar, etc).

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

PGID.description: GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run jackett as.

PUID.description: UID to run jackett as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run jackett as.
